text: "Spare Parts" is a 1988 power ballad by Bruce Springsteen. It was taken from his eighth studio album Tunnel of Love and went to number 32 in the United Kingdom, number 16 in Sweden, number 12 in Ireland, number 10 in Italy, number 78 in the Netherlands. It was not released in the United States. ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Spare Parts (song)
